Its pretty funnny how nobody can seem to get the hint that the grainy quality of this film is intentional and not a problem with the upload. For followers of the work of Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez this type of film making is no suprise. Try watching Grindhouse (the double feature film from which the fake Machete trailer first originated) and then maybe you'll understand whats going on here.

How about "NO" let's NOT put up RAR files.  What's the point?  You need ALL the bits either way except with RAR then I need to make sure I have twice the space available to have two stupid copies of the damn thing at the same time AND assholes have the opportunity of tricking me into downloading a password-protected RAR file.  And to what purpose?  Because for some inane reason you have a fetish for pieces of RAR?  You can't do shit with RAR segments until you have the ENTIRE thing anyway so fuck that!  (At least with unrarred I can sample when enough pieces are down too)  I hate RAR in case that wasn't clear enough.

Oh and another thing is I have to wait 10 minutes for the RAR to unpack after it's downloaded when instead I could just start watching it.  10 minutes to wait is not a problem when it's actually FOR A REASON but wtf is the point of waiting 10 more minutes for the same damn result as when downloading it unrarred in the first place?  That's messed.
